org.biosino.CHS.algorithm
类 GreedyAlg

java.lang.Object
  org.biosino.CHS.algorithm.GreedyAlg

public class GreedyAlg
extends java.lang.Object

This class uses greedy algorithm to detect CHS between two chromosomes (gene lists).

构造函数摘要
GreedyAlg(int num, int gapSize)
          Create a new GreedyAlg object.
 
方法摘要
 java.util.List<CHS> search(Chromosome chrA, Chromosome chrB, java.util.List<Gene> geneListA, java.util.List<Gene> geneListB)
          Search all CHS for two chromosomes using greedy algorithm.
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

构造函数详细信息

GreedyAlg

public GreedyAlg(int num,
                 int gapSize)
Create a new GreedyAlg object.

参数：
num - minimum size of each CHS (number of distinct families).
gapSize - maximum gap size between two neighboring genes linked in a CHS
方法详细信息

search

public java.util.List<CHS> search(Chromosome chrA,
                                  Chromosome chrB,
                                  java.util.List<Gene> geneListA,
                                  java.util.List<Gene> geneListB)
Search all CHS for two chromosomes using greedy algorithm. The two chromosomes will be searched by exchange with each other and then redundancy is removed.

参数：
chrA - chromosome A
chrB - chromosome B
geneListA - gene list A for chromosome A
geneListB - gene list B for chromosome B
返回：
a CHS list containing all CHS
